QuestData.Title: Keepers of Korthia
QuestData.Description:
We've barely held out against the Jailer's forces. Now that you're here, we can finally make some progress.
I know your priority is to enter the vault, but our record keepers must also be recovered.
They are the authorities about everything kept in the vault. We can't let the Jailer learn what they know.
QuestData.LogDescription: Rescue 3 record keepers around the Vault of Secrets.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Meet with Secutor Mevix within the Vault of Secrets.
QuestData.RewardText: A pity all three keepers did not survive. Good work tracking down the two that did.
